Title: Blinding the Riverblades
Description:
"A hooded falcon catches no quarry."

This is one of the first mantras we teach young monks at the temple. It means that even a foe as swift and lethal as a falcon can be neutralized by depriving its senses.

The saurok have scouts all over the region acting as eyes for their raiding parties.

It's time we put their eyes out, don't you think?
ObjectivesText: Kill 8 Riverblade Pathstalkers in the areas surrounding Crane Wing Refuge.
CompletionText: We cannot risk any more saurok ambushes, but we're in no position to take them on in force. Fortunately, with you here, we shouldn't need to.
RewardText:
Well done. I only wish I could have accompanied you...

The blood on these hand-wraps is not my own, you know.
